channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road problems, 22nd October
item.description:
The whole road is uneven and outside 248D there is a crossing for pedestrians. Some of Bellegrove Road was resurfaced in March but there is a slight bump that is shaking the houses at all hours as well as potholes and cracks in the road. There are some sleepless nights due to this. Please can the entire road be resurfaced and repainted as the lines are slowly fading away and it isn’t fair for residents to have sleepless nights. On another note can speed bumps be put into this road as there are a lot of speeders at all hours which keeps residents awake and is a danger to pedestrians as they are overtaking other vehicles near pedestrian crossings. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bellegrove Road, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Washing machine dumped, 21st October
item.description:
Was not there tonight at 830 pm but was there at 1030pm so dumped then. Bins at corner shouldham st and Crawford st

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Shouldham Street, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on Harton Road N9, 21st October
item.description:
Household rubbish again, the regular weekend routine. Among the items, there is packaging displaying a name and address (photo attached). This ongoing issue continues to cause significant nuisance to residents. Even though the end-of-terrace property has installed CCTV in this area, fly-tipping still occurs because of the council’s weak enforcement approach. The council must now take stronger action and issue fines to deter repeat offenders.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harton Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping at Haberdasher Place, 21st October
item.description:
Fly tipping yet again - this rubbish is starting to smell and it contains food items. Risk of rotting and attracting pests. Fly tipping at bins on either side of Haberdasher Place. Please remove ASAP

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Haberdasher Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street Lights., 21st October
item.description:
There are at least 3 lamp post lights that are not working in William Barefoot Drive, Eltham, SE9 3JD. One outside number 44 One outside number 50 One outside number 52/54 It’s pitch black, for the public walking around and it’s dangerous for drivers because it’s on the bend of the main road. Please fix quickly. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47-61, William Barefoot Drive, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Storm drains continue to not drain in heavy rain, 21st October
item.description:
Any time there is heavy rain these two drains outside number 18 do not drain quickly enough and surface flooding reaches up the pavement and on to the driveways - this creates dangerous driving conditions on the road. This continues to be a problem.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Riverdale Road, Bexley, London

item.title: Car green abandoned here 25 hours, 21st October
item.description:
Nice car abandoned where nobody ever leaves a car - narrow road. Assume it's been left to check if there's a tracker.. can't get registration when driving!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mottingham Lane, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ongoing issue with no regular street cleaning, 21st October
item.description:
Hello - I reported a street cleaning issue yesterday - fag ends left by the archway on Headfort place and no regular street cleaning. Have returned homes tonight the fag ends are gone and the area by the archway weeded but the rest of the street has not been swept from top to bottom. There is a dog poo bag still sitting close to my house in the gutter, this is a know health risk there is debris at the upper end of the street - bits of plastic, plastic wrappers and the street has still not been properly cleaned. I am now recording all of these requests. The street should be swept daily and this is not happening.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Headfort Place, Belgravia, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lights all out along both sides of crossway from fieldfare Rd to Curlew close, 21st October
item.description:
All street lights out both sides of main road - this has been on going since last year 2024 - I reported it more then once last year but still out and now the report has been closed !! Without the problem being fixed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Haldane Road, London
